website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking garden furniture set that's straightforward to put together.
pros: Owners praise this set for how easy the components are to assemble
2 chairs, dual-seat sofa, and coffee table are made of rattan-like material in stylish black or gray
Includes cushions and a glass table top
cons: Pieces are on the small side, and their construction feels a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, reliable seller
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with both the product and customer service! The seller answered my questions regarding delivery during the CV19 pandemic and I was really happy that the set arrived quicker than expected (within 2 days of ordering). Easily put together with no problems, it's an all round great patio set. I would certainly recommend this seller and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Neat little set
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a little tricky. Just the screwing in was a bit fiddley in parts and the rattan material was in the way of one of the screw holes so we had to snip it. Other than that it's a neat little set and I'm happy with the overall look of it on my decking. One of the chairs was slightly wobbley but it's fine once you're sat on it. For the money I can't complain. Bought some jazzy scatter cushions for it! Overall I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend this to anyone who wanted a slightly more compact set (perfect for a balcony or small patio/decking area)
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, although best bit of advice is to locate the screws loosely by a couple or three turns until the last one is in else you will have trouble getting it all to line up. All in one box, everything was labeled and easy to locate for assembly, even a few extra screws and washers in case. Assembly took about an hour on my own, although I used an electric screwdriver for final tightening up of screws, this was a godsend. Looks great in the garden, as classy as some sets costing almost three times the price. Just waiting on better weather so we can enjoy it lol
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. D. Carruthers

customer_reviews.title: Found it easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little garden set for the price , It was pretty simple to assemble , the cushions are shower proof, and can be washed . It’s the perfect size for my garden. Delivery time , was speedy considering , the circumstances with covd19 so was happy . Great service ,great little item
customer_reviews.author: karen baker

customer_reviews.title: 2 people to put together, light but sturdy- delivered early, good value
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort and look of this set. Arrived 5days earlier than expected...bonus! As said previously, parts are tricky to put together, someone’s tip to only just connect until all screws in, then tighten is bette but hubby turned the air blue a couple of times. Overall delighted, real value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Maw Broon

customer_reviews.title: Nice design value for money - cheap fixings
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern design, value for money ultimately you get what you pay for, the same screws used throughout makes for easier assembly however screws don't always line up well and difficult to go in because powder coat not cleaned properly. Very quick delivery early than expected even during COVID. I would recommend for the price this product is great.
customer_reviews.author: RK01

customer_reviews.title: Great garden set
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and very fast delivery.item is fab too.
customer_reviews.author: D D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very well priced
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this just before lockdown, very reasonably priced compared to similar furniture. Only took half a hour to assemble with 2 people, and the best thing l have brought. Have used every day for the last 11 weeks, only thing l would say get some scatter cushions makes it much more comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Nice when put together. Slightly wobbly though. Put up by my dad who’s an engineer & he couldn’t get the set to not wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Owen

customer_reviews.title: Nice cute compact sturdy garden furniture
customer_reviews.text: Really like our new garden furniture. Its good value for money and a compact sturdy piece of furniture. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: nicola louise kwekha

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money garden set.
customer_reviews.text: The garden furniture is really nice and comfy. Great to entertain friends. Essembly was a bit fiddly, but after reading instructions again it is better to contruct when screws are loose. Then tighten at the end when all parts are in and your happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. French

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions and advice in reviews and put it together by myself. Easy to do. The furniture looks great on my little patio and is comfortable. Have seen these sets cheaper but they were all out of stock and I wanted it now. Received within a few days. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly (the day after ordering). It was easier to put together than expected - having read some reviews - but it is advisable to have two people - It would have been tricky doing it alone. We ordered it for a fairly confined space and so were a bit worried that it might be too bulky. However, it is a perfect size - not overly cumbersome - and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Nuttall

customer_reviews.title: Pain to put together but pretty comfy once together
customer_reviews.text: What a pain in the arse this is to put together. Once it's up though it looks brilliant and is pretty comfy. I really wouldn't want to put one together again so won't be buying anymore
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is the same as the ones available for around £100 I hope not
customer_reviews.author: Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Its comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Very compact once built but I like that it feels very comfy, looks good in the garden aswell. Only annoyance was the Allen key. The screws were so tight to the corners it took me ages to tighten them with the allen key. Maybe look at changing the Allen key to suit for ease of building! Other than that was great
customer_reviews.author: Chaz and CraigO

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy great looking
customer_reviews.text: Had a few teething problems assembly wise down to my own stupidity once took deep breath took no time at all assembling really sturdy great looking highly recommended great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Brian Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice garden set
customer_reviews.text: The whole set looks lovely under my gazebo. Pleased with the overall effect and comfy to use. However what a faf to put together. All with a small Allen key and still one screw not in as holes do not align.
customer_reviews.author: Sam lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking garden furniture
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set of garden furniture and seems sturdy enough. Easy to assemble but probably better to have a second person to hold it as you screw it together.
customer_reviews.author: Billkmc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lovely thick cushions
customer_reviews.text: Nice furniture but fixings were a nightmare. Have since seen similar furniture for lower price but don't know if it is same quality. Arrived sooner than expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fabulous buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing!I am so happy with my purchase I would recommend this product and the value for money is fantastic. Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good patio set, easy to assemble, contacted seller who replied quickly and positively about stock availability.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, very sturdy when put together. As others have mentioned the chairs will take a bit of time to put together, The first one might be challenging but once you get the order of things it will be easier to put the other one together. Overall I'm happy. the screws were aligned for me so can't comment on what others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: some of the screw holes don't always match up you need someone to push or pull to try and get holes lined up but then sometimes the screw are not long enough but only just so leave of the washers and you may just get a start on the screw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: time to put together
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time looks god. managed to put table together quite quickly. around an hour for the 2 seater. gave up with a chair after 1.1/2 hours. holes do not seem to be placed very well. will try again 2morrow b4 they go out the window. got it together eventually looks good in the garden
customer_reviews.author: joaneyG

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money but not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good value for the money, very hard to assemble even following the instructions of not tightening the fixings until all were in place did not enable me to fasten one of the bolts. Looks nice once assembled
customer_reviews.author: sarah teehan

customer_reviews.title: Great little set.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. So nice to look at and easy to put together. Sturdy, lightweight but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rymarz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this furniture for my summer house. Look brilliant and are very sturdy. Took a bit of time to assemble, make sure all bolts are in place but not tightened until the end or the last bolt will not catch in the thread.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute set, nightmare to put together
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little set for a reasonable cost but be prepared to spend 2-3 hours building it up! The holes don’t match up very well for the screws and it’s a little bit wobbly but overhaul i,m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: claire roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality.. I'm so happy with this set.. Would recommend these..
customer_reviews.author: Sha Sha

customer_reviews.title: OK!
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble. But I am happy to have them in my balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Rasa

customer_reviews.title: Great garden furniture
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is very comfortable a must buy for the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Delroy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the money. You will need some spare longer screws, some of the standard ones provided aren’t quite long enough. Lovely set and would recommend. (You will need two people to assemble)!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden Set
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the set it looks lovely. Had a small problem lining the table up and glass didn't fit properly, but contacted the seller who acted immediately and they are sending out a new table, which I am waiting to arrive. Set also arrived before the estimated time given, which was another plus point.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Payne

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. Smaller than expected but happy. Looks lovely in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: becca Louise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and beautiful furniture set
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my new furniture set!! My order arrived almost a week early and I received delivery updates from the seller. Although it was a bit tricky to assemble as the instructions are very basic, it was worth the patience as it looks great - exactly like the pictures!! Would 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holes don't line up.
customer_reviews.text: The holes for the screws don't line up. He'll of a job.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Small patio set for a small garden
customer_reviews.text: Lovely comfy just a little difficult to assemble by yourself !
customer_reviews.author: kelly from surrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round
customer_reviews.text: This set is excellent for the price! Looks better in real life than the photo, is very comfy to sit on for hours and is light yet strong. So grateful I chose this set, it has transformed our outside space
customer_reviews.author: Marci Flower

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Garden Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous garden furniture. So happy with my purchase. Arrived earlier than expected which was great. Very easy to put together. Customer service was great. Answered all my queries. Highly recommend this furniture set.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Got this garden furniture, it is quite nice to look at and quite comfortable but it is very fiddly to put together and 2 of the screwholes have no threads, and the screws aren't long enough so the backrests are only held on with one screw. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: the sofa is a bit smaller than it looked in the picture but it is lovely for the money
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service as item delivered earlier than stated. Easy to assemble, sturdy and very nice looking set....exactly what we wanted for our garden. Very helpful seller and I have no hesitation in recommending them. Very satisfied and happy customer, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality & brilliant customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, great value for money & excellent customer service. There was a small chip in the table top glass & some damage to one of the chair legs. Emailed seller & new chair & glass delivered within the week. Would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble. Small Allen key. Legs uneven but doesn’t wobble once you sit down. Looks nice though after all the struggling.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. Hit a slight assembly issue. Emailed supplier who contacted me by phone within a couple of hours, issue resolved. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: karen turner

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdie due to a leg shorter than others and glass top in coffee table not very secure
customer_reviews.author: julie davison

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it. It was so easy to put together and this was good value for money. It actually came earlier than planned which was fab so we're able to enjoy some sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap garden furniture
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price easy to put together no help needed looks really good
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can get a cover to fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the set only one problem cannot get a cover to fit properly 😃
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this set its perfect . Did need 2 people to assemble but was easy . Its sturdy and of good quality. I would definitely recommend as a good buy and worth the money . It arrived before estimated delivery day .
customer_reviews.author: pamela petrie

customer_reviews.title: A value for money set. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: A great set for the price. A couple of hours between two of us to assemble. A womans brain and a mans labour, no problem.lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B

customer_reviews.title: Rattan furniture as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky to assemble. The Alan key was difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: Betty M Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quality furniture set for a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bit tricky to assemble with an Allen key but once I got the hang of things it was assembled in just over an hour. Very comfy and very sturdy. Bargain furniture set.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small gardens.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set of garden furniture, comfortable and was easy to assemble. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: J F Hinchley

customer_reviews.title: Garden furniture
customer_reviews.text: It is small but good and fit for the size of my balcony. You need to treat it with care though because it is very delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Alman

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, looks nice. Easy to assemble. However does need tightening now and again
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic evra rattan furniture. Looks great. Should have bought from here at the start.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Ratton furniture, it came very fast, only took 3 days to arrive. I am over the moon with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with set quite easy to put together Coffee table glass did not fit that well
customer_reviews.author: kimmers

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant love it and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, easy to put together and looks great. Very quick and early delivery. Sturdy too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its garden furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sit on in my garden and thats what I do with it. Cats like it too. A 1 million stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to put together, better with two people. Very sturdy, comfortable had everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together as I did it myself, I’m very happy with this set as I only have a small garden so perfect
customer_reviews.author: Miss H

customer_reviews.title: It's fabulous gud value very smart
customer_reviews.text: It looks fabulous love it so glad I choose it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase, great value for money. Looks good too !
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Very nice garden furniture, but was hard to assemble only because were the screws have to go.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money set highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, easy to assemble and really good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Miss VF Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time but no fixings in the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth buying
customer_reviews.text: just what I wanted very good fast delivery thank you
customer_reviews.author: Angela kime

product_meta.title: Evre Rattan Garden Furniture Set Patio Conservatory Indoor Outdoor 4 piece set table chair sofa (Black)
feature_bullets: Evre Outdoor Garden Furniture Set comes with A Coffee Table, Two Comfortable Single Chairs, along with a Two-Seater Sofa!
Cushions are Extra Thick providing a more comfortable Seating Experience with Removable & Washable Cushion covers which Is Dirt Resistant, Showerproof!
High Quality PE Rattan weave material providing a luxurious look along with a Tempered Safety Glass situated on top of the Coffee Table. Excellent for Low Maintenance!

Furniture Does Come Flat-Packed and will require Assembly. Assembly of Furniture is very easy & Efficient, a full instruction manual is provided with the purchase. The Full Furniture Set comes in one single Box.

All of our Furniture Sets are Fully Certified & Safe to use, This Furniture Test has been tested and regulated to comply with the UK Furniture and Furnishings fire & Safe Regulations! If at any point you are unhappy with the purchase, please kindly drop us an email and we will ensure to resolve the issue at a satisfactory Resolution!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars97 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
